Baked Lemon Pudding

Baked Lemon Pudding

serves 4 to 6

Skirlie

50g drippings

Melt the butter in a pan and add the onion, frying gently to soften.

1 onion - finely chopped

175g oatmeal

Stir in the oatmeal, season and cook gently for 10 minutes.

Salt and pepper
